Comments.Message: Whats your reason for wanting to do this? The detached LCD is meant to simply be a copy of the screen that is resizable when youre in skinned mode, you should still be using the normal LCD for all your input methods.

Why? For example: for teachers : you want to teach the basis of algorithmic to your student (yes, that's what is learn in France).

You can show it on a white wall using something I can't remember the name.

So the students look at a big screen and do exactly what the teacher does, so they can learn fast.

Regards.
*since you can resize the detached LCD

right you created the detached LCD so the students can look at it, then press the buttons on the skin, so they can follow what you're doing. Its what the LCD was created for. Most teachers using the view are using the skin to input, not the keyboard
